properties.body:
SCOTLAND-NORTH COAST.
NORTH MINCH.
GPS SATELLITE SYSTEM.
DNC 19, DNC 20.
1. GPS JAMMING EXERCISES:
   A. 0730Z TO 0830Z AND 1600Z TO 1700Z DAILY
      06, 07 AND 12 THRU 16 OCT
      WITHIN 28 MILES OF 57-51.9N 005-41.1W
      BETWEEN 285 DEGREES AND 040 DEGREES.
   B. 1400Z TO 1600Z DAILY 09 AND 10 OCT
      WITHIN 36 MILES OF 58-36.2N 004-46.5W
      BETWEEN 270 DEGREES AND 100 DEGREES.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 161800Z OCT 15.
